mapper.insert: insert into label (id, label_category_id, label_name, owner_id, create_time, open_time, open) values (#{id}, #{labelCategoryId}, #{labelName}, #{ownerId}, #{createTime}, #{openTime}, #{open})
mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.label_category_id, c.label_category_name, c.label_category_id, c.pic_url, c.share_url, c.on_sale, c.new_flag, c.hot_flag, l.label_name, l.owner_id, l.create_time, l.open_time, l.open FROM label l LEFT JOIN label_category c on c.label_category_id = l.label_category_id WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId}
